attributes.action: Did you know a poor country called Ogadenia?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ogadenia is a poor country with no goverment but a dictator.
people of ogadenia are treated beyond imagination worse than animals, becouse atleast animals make a noise to ask for food. the women of agadenia are raped,children are slaughtered,and men are hunged, all of this becouse of britain!!
i am boy who misses his homeland,and every time i see the pictures of how my people are treated and tortured,i burst into tears and i am sure you would feel the same way!
please help people of Ogadenia and stop the genocide and the injustice.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
